## Summary Statistics

kurtosis - shape of the distibutions tails, skewedness
moments
histogram

```{r stats}
set.seed(438)
x <- rweibull(10000, 5)
summarize_stats(x)
```

```{r}
dt <- data.frame(x)
nbins <- 30
g <- ggplot(dt, aes(x)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), 
                bins = nbins, fill = NA, color = "black") +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank())
g
```


## Diagnostic Plots

histogram vs density plot

```{r}
dists <- c('exp', 'gamma', 'lnorm', 'weibull')
cols <- c('black', 'red', 'blue', 'yellow')
multipleFits <- lapply(dists, fit_univariate, x = x)
for (i in 1:length(multipleFits)) {
  g <- g +
    stat_function(fun = multipleFits[[i]][[1]],
                  aes_(color = cols[i]),
                  size = 1)
}
g +
  scale_color_manual(name = "Distribution",
                     values = cols, 
                     breaks = cols, 
                     labels = dists)
```
